name: Gyokucho Razor saw Utility knife 80 (Japan import)
short_description: Blade length: 80 mm. The durability is also excellent, and it keeps sharp sharpness for a long time. Allows any wood cutting.

Pitch: 1.3 mm. Pitch (mm): The size of the blade mesh, the distance from the tip of the blade to the tip of the next blade. The smaller the value, the finer the mesh, and the larger the value, the coarser the mesh.
Thickness: 0.45 mm

Kerf: 0.55 mm. Impact quenching is a heat treatment method that uses ultra-high frequency (27.12MHz) and heats only the surface of the saw blade with impact energy to the quenching temperature in 0.003 to 0.005 seconds to obtain a cured layer.
Use: wood, bamboo, PVC, plastic. Gyokucho is a Japanese manufacturer.
product_description: [Use] Wood, bamboo, PVC, plastic. [Features & Function] Excellent sharpness even if it is small! Great for small woodworking and bamboo craftsmanship. It can be used widely from general users to professionals. It is very convenient for work at home and space-saving work anywhere. Since the every blades of this series can be attached to a cutter body (L type), there is no need to buy another cutter body. Just switch blades. [Materials] Saw blade: steel. Body: Plastic. Gyokucho is the premier Japanese manufacturer of high quality saws with a reputation for reliability and good performance at a modest price. We use a method called impulse hardening to increase the durability of the tooth tips. The cutting edge is heated for 0.003 to 0.005 seconds by applying an electrical current at super high-frequency of 27.12Mhz, instantly hardening the surface of the steel while maintaining the flexibility inside. As a result, the saw’s wear resistance increases. The surface hardness of the blade is approximately from Hv 900 to 1200. The hardened saw tooth is much harder than sharpening files so the blade cannot be sharpened and needs to be replaced once it is dull. All products have a name, blade thickness, the blade length, and even the extra blade part number marked on themselves. The marking is done by a laser irradiation method and won't wear off. So even when you lose the package, you can easily identify the products by checking its laser marking. Electro less nickel plating prevents the blade from rusting, and there is no need to worry cutting materials getting dirty with the rust.

name: Silky Professional Series PocketBoy Folding Saw 170mm Medium Teeth (340-17)
short_description: The PocketBoy is compact, lightweight & takes up little room in your toolbox, backpack, glove box or pocket and comes with a hard plastic belt case
Features a rust-resistant, hard chrome-plated, taper-ground blade with impulse-hardened, non-set teeth

Blade length is 170mm/6.7 inches, 1.4mm blade thickness, 8.5 teeth per inch (10 teeth per 30mm) Medium teeth configuration, Cut capacity 3.4" & has 2 open locking positions for in line or flush cutting
Extraordinary cutting capacity ideal for landscaping, pruning & trimming, camping, trail maintenance & general outdoors
WARNING: Beware of thinner, non-Professional blades that are made for the Japanese market only. If your blade doesn’t have the word Professional etched into it, please report the seller to Amazon

name: EZ KUT WOW Folding Saw 10” – Heavy-Duty Hand Saw for Tree Trimming, Pruning & Wood Cutting – Compact Foldable Design for Camping, Hunting & Survival – Razor Sharp SK4 Steel Blade
short_description: SLOTTED, SHARP BLADE FOR EFFICIENT CUT: This Curved Pruning Saw features a large 10 inch curved surface, replaceable blade with ground tri-edge teeth to reduce cutting resistance. Cut on the draw stroke using the slotted blade with an aggressive tooth pattern cleaning as it cuts. This keeps the blade cooler to resist sap and pitch build up, reducing cutting resistance and increasing efficiency.

BEST PAIN FREE PRUNING SAWS FOR TREE TRIMMING: Make the EZ Kut Wow Saw your go-to tree pruner. Its ergonomic non-slip rubber grip is built for comfort and safety. The metal on metal locking system locks open and closed for ultimate safety. Stay safe while using this folding pruning saw and remaining comfortable during extending use.

LONG LASTING PRUNING SAW BLADE: The hand saw blades are built to last with its Taper Ground Hard Chrome Plated SK4 Japanese style Steel Blade. Built with long lasting impulse hardened teeth for superior durability and lasting sharpness. Make this one of the garden tools you depend on every season because of its durability and toughness.

THE FOLDING SAW TREE PRUNER FOR ALL OUTDOORSMAN: Professional, Tough and Lightweight, this pruning saw is the perfect gift as a hand saw for women and men as part of their gardening hand tools. Also perfect for hunting, camping, landscaping, trail riding, and snowmobiling.

BUILD TO LAST: The EZ Kut Wow Folding Saw is tested in harshest environments while being backed by industry leading customer service since 1988. Purchase this curved hand saw knowing you will have peace of mind and next-level satisfaction.

name: Kimura® 7" Pro Folding Pruning Saw - Heavy Duty Premium Japanese SK5 Steel Hand Saw, Ergonomic Soft Non-Slip Handle, Lightweight Foldable Ideal for Branches, Trimming, Camping, PVC, Hiking, Wood
short_description: [ SHARP & PRECISE ] - The 7-inch Japanese SK5 steel saw has a double layer edge, ensuring precision cutting and long-lasting sharpness. Ideal for both trimming and pruning wood up to 3 inches thick.
[ FOLDABLE ] – The folding saw is equipped with a rotating swivel at the handle allowing the saw to fold open into 3 unique positions allowing for comfortable sawing at all angles.

[ ERGONOMIC DESIGN ] - The non-slip handles feature a soft grip for enhanced comfort, control and safety. The even distribution of weight between the saw and handles makes it easy for anyone to use this pruning saw.
[ RUST RESISTANT ] - Chrome plating helps the saw glide through wood without sap build-up or rusting, allowing for a smooth cut every time.
[ HIGHLY VERSATILE ] - Kimura’s saw can be used in multiple situations including gardening and woodwork, or as part of a outdoors kit when camping or hiking.
[ EASY OPEN & CLOSE ] - Kimura’s folding pruning saw is equipped with a safety lock that is quick and easy to operate requiring only a light squeeze to unlock, and simple thumb push to lock securely.
[ MADE TO LAST ] – Reinforced ABS construction with anti-rust components and a riveted handle guarantee a durable product that is sure to stand the test of time.

[ LIFETIME WARRANTY ] - We are so confident in the quality of our pruning saw that a lifetime warranty is included in your purchase. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your purchase, simply contact us and we will make it right.

name: WORKPRO Quick-Change Utility Knife, Classical Retro Style Wood Grain Handle, Back Lock Folding Knife with Clip
short_description: BEFORE YOUR PURCHASE - The wooden handle of utility knife is made of high-quality rosewood, and the dark brown texture will lead to a classical retro look of the knife. It is a completely new knife with special design, please do not worry.

QUICK-CHANGE MECHANISM - Your box cutter comes with an easy blade release design that allows you to safely change the blades and helps prevent injury. Our box knife is compatible with most standard sized utility blades for extra convenience.

EXTREMELY SAFE - This razor knife is built with a wooden handle and anti-slip grip which provides more security for you. No need to worry about the blade slipping from your hand while you are working. Also our utility knife is built with a back lock design that safely keeps your blades in place when in use.

PORTABLE - This box cutter knife is designed with compact size and equipped with a belt clip which enhances easy carrying everyday. You can easily clip it on/off your belt, carry it in your pocket or in your bag so you will always have it with you when needed.

VARIOUS APPLICATIONS - Our heavy duty utility knife is built to last. It can be used for various different jobs that you may need to get done. It cuts through paper, carpet, plastic, cartons, cloth, bags, leather, PVC, dry wall and much more. Get more work done with our durable cutter knife.

name: Samurai KISI FC-240-LH / 9 1/2" (24cm) Folding Curved Blade Saw Made in Japan
short_description: Model: FC-240-LH
Blade Type: Curved.
Blade Length: 240mm (9 1/2")
Tooth Pitch: 4mm.
Blade-Only B083TX2TGY
product_description: Samurai Folding Curved Hand Saw Made in Japan. KISI (FC Series) A well balanced, folding, hand saw for the gardener and the professional alike. The Samurai taper ground blades and the ergonomically designed handles offer exceptional comfort and superb cutting performance. The computer-designed, folding handle is based on human engineering principals. The hand grip is covered with rubber cushion to prevent slipping. The special curve of the handle reduces effort required for cutting, - making it possible to cut harder material with ease. The notched end of the handle prevents accidental dropping of the saw - when loosely held and the blade can be folded up - and housed inside the handle for safety and blade protection. The curved blade offers best results when cutting above shoulder height. Specs: Model: FC-240-LH Blade Type: Curved. Blade Length: 240mm (9 1/2") Tooth Pitch: 4mm. Contact us for any question regarding this item.

name: Gerber Freescape Camp Saw Folding Hand Saw for Backpacking Hiking Camping Pruning and Bushcraft, 12" Blade
short_description: IN THE BOX: Freescape Camp Saw with a 12" blade the folds completely flat for transportation

INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Our compact design allows the saw to fold up flat while remaining completely assembled and without threat of lost parts. It uses 4 pivot points to effectively cut larger diameter wood while using the full legth of the blade. When folded up the blade is protected and can be stowed safely in a gear kit or camp bin

BRIGHT ACCENTS: Its bright green accents along the black rubber surface make it easy to spot in the shuffle of camp gear. The grippy rubber Freescape textured handle stays firmly in the hand no matter the conditions. Replace the saw’s standard 12” blade easily if required.d]
CONVENIENT SIZE: The 12" Blade is big enough for function on the site and it folds completely flat to fit into your backpack.

name: FLORA GUARD 7.7-Inch Folding Hand Saw, Camping/Pruning Saw with Rugged Professional Folding Razor Tooth Sharp Blade Solid Grip (Brown)
short_description: Our hand saw for cutting through High-carbon steel, 7" razor tooth blade cuts through branches up to 4" in diameter
Triple-cut razor teeth of the pruning saw hardened to stay sharp for smooth, fast sawing

Ergonomic and comfortable handle of the small saw fits the hand naturally and is designed to prevent dropping when loosely held. It remains stable during strong pulls resulting in accurate cuts.The size will work with any hand size from small to extra-large

Fully hardened stainless-steel 7.7inch saw blade. Razor tooth saws are designed to be as comfortable in your hand as they are effective in cutting. Each whetstone-ground razor tooth is sharpened on 3 sides, then impulse hardened for a longer life

FLORA GUARD hand saw is easy to open & close with a lock. Which keeps blade firmly in place during use and prevent the accident of saw blade falling or gripping by impacting, beside, it ensures safe when not in use. Dedicating to make a better tools for gardeners

name: ToughBuilt - Folding Jab/Utility Saw, Drywall Blade w/triple-edge teeth (8 TPI) for faster cutting, + 4 Blades, Quick-fold and blade release mechanism - TB-H4S5-23FU

Blade release mechanism for tool-less blade replacement
Includes 5 reciprocating saw blades for wood, plastic, metal, and drywall
Jab saw is compatible with most reciprocating saw blades
Drywall blade with triple-edge teeth (8 TPI) for faster cutting

name: MOSSY OAK 3 in 1 Folding Saw, Pruning Hand Saw with Wood, Metal and PVC Blade, Camping Saw for Backpacking, Hunting and Bushcraft, Pouch Included
short_description: EASY CHANGE - Adjust the black knob to change the blades. [ATTENTION] : Choose special direction you need after changing blade, tighten black knob on the back before use, to prevent the blade remove or upward. Featuring triple-cut razor sharp teeth, the folding hand saw can easily cuts wood, tree, bone and plastic metal, be a great help in the bush for trail maintenance or while camping or constructing shelter

THREE MULTI-PURPOSE BLADES - All blades are sharp for smooth, fast sawing: 1. [Pruning blade - black coated surface]: 5TPI, 65Mn, Length 190 mm (7.5 inch), for ≤ 70 mm branches; 2. [Hardwood/Plastic blade - gray surface]: 11TPI, 65Mn, Length 190 mm (7.5 inch), for ≤ 5 mm plastic pipe or 120 mm hardwood; 3. [Metal blade - polished coated surface]: 18TPI, 58CrV, Length 190 mm (7.5 inch), for ≤ 1 mm copper pipe or 1.5 mm aluminium pipe

SOFT YET SOLID HANDLE - Economic slip-resistant comfort grip handle features with TPR rubber coated. The proper size can work with any hand size. The rugged razor tooth blade remains stable during strong pulls resulting in accurate cuts

SECURE LOCK - Tighten the black knob during use to prevent the blade upward or remove. Lock System prevents the blade from accidental close during use. Push the green button and fold the saw blade, store it in your pocket when it's idle. Before putting into use, take the folding saw out from the sheath, open and stretch the saw blade and lock it

BONUS NYLON POUCH - Nylon sheath in the package, can hold hand saw and 2 additional replaced blades as well, easy and safe to carry multi-purpose tool for utility job. Take different blades for real work of wood, bone, plastic according to the actual situation
